column2: A visitor can add messages to the site
column14:
As a visitor
When I go to the home page
I see 
* a name text field
* a message text field
* a submit button that says "Add Message"

When I click the button, I see my message appear beneath the message box.  It shows my message and my name.

column2: A visitor can see all messages
column14:
When I go to the homepage, 
I see all of the other messages that other people have left.

column2: Clicking on a continent shows the wrong things
